channel.title: How do i item spawn?
channel.description:
Where does Item ID go Where do co-ords go ?
ItemHandler.addItem(3801, 3269, 3434, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Keg of beer

item.title: How do i item spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Cartmen881 Cartmen881
item.description:
@Cartmen881 wrote:

To spawn an item in Hybridscape, type in ::item

For EX: ::item 3140

An item will drop on your players feet

Read full topic

item.title: How do i item spawn?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Hmm. I see. I’ve seen people change the name of the ‘Abbysal Whip’ to ‘Super Whip’ although when on the ground and right clicked, it wasn’t named ‘Super Whip’. Only when you clicked on your ‘Attack Style’ tab did it show you the name ‘Super Whip’.

item.title: How do i item spawn?
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Place this into itemspawnlist…

Heres how it works, my example:

ItemHandler.addItem(ITEM ID, COORD X, COORD Y, AMOUNT, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // ITEM NAME

The ITEM ID is obviously the id number of the item, then replace COORD X with the x coordination of the spawn point, then replace COORD Y with the y coordinate of the spawnpoint, then AMOUNT, e.g. 1. Along with the ITEM NAME.

Read full topic
